The video was shot on the Strait of Geor: Canada, not at the point where the Atlantic and Pacific oceans meet.
The video was originally titled: When the river meets the ocean" on YouTube, referring to the Fraser River flowing into the Strait of Georgia, indicating it was not about the meeting of two oceans.
The video attracted significantly fewer: 4. The claim was debunked by an expert who explained that the color difference between the two bodies of water in the video is due to their composition, not the meeting of two oceans.
